extends java.lang.Object

      • loadSchedule

        public Queue<Game> loadSchedule(java.util.ArrayList<Team> league,
                                boolean display)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        load in all the games upcoming in the schedule
        Parameters:
        league - , an ArrayList of all teams in the league
        display - , a boolean variable saying if the user wants to display all the games (true) or not (false)
        Returns:
        schedule , a Queue with all the upcoming games
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • loadIndividualGame

        public Game loadIndividualGame(java.lang.String gameName,
                               java.util.ArrayList<Team> league,
                               boolean display)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Loads all the data for 1 game
        Parameters:
        gameName - the title of the game (i.e. team one vs team two)
        league - , an ArrayList of all teams in the league
        display - , a boolean variable saying if the user wants to display all the games (true) or not (false)
        Returns:
        Game , a game object with the teams playing and the date of the game
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
